actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear in the name of the Senate as amicus curiae in Pacific Legal Foundation, et al. vs Watt and Mountain States Legal Foundation, et al. v. Watt, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in the cases of Pacific Legal Foundation, et al. v. Watt and Mountain States Legal Foundation, et al. v. Watt, et al.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear in the name of the Senate as amicus curiae in Pacific Legal Foundation, et al. vs Watt and Mountain States Legal Foundation, et al. v. Watt, et al.
